name: flowingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a smooth, continuous, or relaxed way: She smiled and lifted her arm out in the air, easily and flowingly. She danced flowingly, giving as much importance to the small steps as she did to a final grand pose.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was so flowingly dressed in dark layers that her pregnancy was hardly noticeable.I thoroughly enjoyed his intelligent and flowingly written book.It was strange to hear them speak so flowingly about such a complex man.
